1.12.2.airplanes-1.12.2-1.0.0:
Changes:
-added flying airplanes
- added basic config
- added basic jei compat
- fixed energy problems (combustion engine, solar panel and energy storage block)
- fixed oil mixing with lava
 texture updates
1.12.2.airplanes-1.12.2-0.9: Added full functionality for combustion engine and solar panel, some new item textures
1.12.2.airplanes-1.12.2-0.8: New items, new stuff, new textures, start of energy
1.12.2.airplanes-1.12.2-0.7: New items (suitcase, cpus, a display and circuit boards) and blocks
1.12.2.airplanes-1.12.2-0.6: Added gears: wooden, stone, iron, golden and diamond gear
1.12.2.airplanes-1.12.2-0.5: Added Combustion Engine, a new Block to produce energy.
1.12.2.airplanes-1.12.2-0.4: First processing blocks. Also includes a new crafting item / block, the Coil.
1.12.2.airplanes-1.12.2-0.3: Block expansions and basic crafting elements
1.12.2.airplanes-1.12.2-0.0.2: This pre-alpha build includes an updated Airplanes Part Builder and the first blocks and items. In addition, we now have enhanced language support.
1.12.2.airplanes-1.12.2-0.0.1: First version, only for ALPHA testing.
